revised_title: Investigation of the Third Spark Spectrum of Arsenic (As IV)
tldr: The author investigates the third spark spectrum of arsenic (As IV) and identifies the higher members of the triplet system, singlets, and inter-combination lines of the spectrum. They determine the absolute values of the characteristic terms and estimate the ionization potential of arsenic. The study contributes to the understanding of arsenic's atomic structure and its place in the periodic table.
